name: Stronger but Heavier!
description:
You are a pizza delivery person named Tom who has devised a plan to leave his pizza behind when giving it to a customer for him to eat himself. Embark on Tom's bizarre adventure to retrieve his pizza.

The amazing background music is NOT made by me. It can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wotOnGQrJW8&t=22s. Everything else is made by me.

You can press "R" to die btw.
